Text: My new Contact DetailsAll Just wanted to let you know that I am now settled in here at Reliant Here are my new contact details at work Shari Stack Senior Counsel Reliant Resources Inc Louisiana Ste Houston TX tel fax I really miss all of you at Enron and I hope we can keep in touch Shari

Re lunch Ann Elizabeth beat you to that date Would Thursday the th be possible Heard the news that Harlan is joining Enron that should really help out ElizabethSager enroncom To cc Subject Re lunch PM HI Shari How about the th for lunch

RE MidC Call Option Confirmation Cc Elizabeth Attached is the MidC Call Option Confirmation you reviewed this morning Many of the changes you suggested were quite valid thanks for that The only modifications that we would prefer not to accept were the ones to Delivery Point and in the last line of the Description of Transaction Regarding the former we would rather not place specific parameters as to how to chose the replacement DP this goes for all of our counterparties not just Enron Which DP will be similar to the original DP in terms of homogeneity and liquidity to us or to Enron is truly subjective and furthermore we would not want to agree to stricter parameters with Enron than with other counterparties The reality is that the parties are likely to disagree on the replacement DP when and if this event occurs and thus the method for resolving this and any other dispute is arbitration under Section of the EEI Master Please let me know if the attached revised draft Confirmation will be acceptable to you Thanks Shari See attached file Enron Gas Daily Call Option Revised doc Enron Gas Daily Call Option Revised doc

RE MidC Call Option Confirmation FINALIZED Cc I have spoken with Elizabeth and we have agreed that the version below is the one we will use to document the transaction if you all can agree on price Thanks Shari ElizabethSager enroncom To cc PM Subject RE MidC Call Option Confirmation Hi Shari Thanks for the revised draft just a couple of things I wanted to talk to you about which I have incorporated into a revised draft Call me when you get a chance at Thanks See attached file Enron Gas Daily Call Option Revised doc See attached file Enron Gas Daily Call Option Revised doc Enron Gas Daily Call Option Revised doc

Revised confirm Cc reviewed Chris version of the Confirmation below I have made a few changes to it now that there is only one Delivery Period The attached is redlined for ease of reference As far as I am concerned it is ready to go Lets see if Elizabeth concurs Thanks Shari See attached file Enron Gas Daily Call Option doc Forwarded by Shari StackADMHouInd on PM Forwarded by Robert OttPGHouInd on PM Lackey Chris Chris NRONcom on PM To cc Subject Revised confirm The attachment cleans up a few nits The word Period was omitted in a couple spots in the Description of Transaction paragraph Got weekend plans Chris Reliant Enron MidC tolldoc See attached file Reliant Enron MidC tolldoc Enron Gas Daily Call Option doc Reliant Enron MidC tolldoc

Re Revised confirm FINAL VERSION Cc All I am fine with Elizabeths changes Here is the agreed version without the blacklining Thanks Shari See attached file Enron Gas Daily Call Option FINAL doc Enron Gas Daily Call Option FINAL doc

Dynegythought you should know I hope this was not Harlans idea Forwarded by Shari StackADMHouInd on PM Terri A Parrish To Kelly D ouInd Shari ouInd cc Christy B ouInd AM Mike ouInd Subject Dynegy FYI I have received a letter from Dynegy terminating the old Interchange agreement as of June Dynegy asks that all future business be conducted under WSPP this also includes DynegyDirect trading Have we heard anything regarding the collateral threshold issue Terri

Re lunch Thursday would be great thanks I am looking forward to seeing you Shari ElizabethSager enroncom To cc Subject Re lunch AM Hi Shari Thanks for the message I can do lunch next Thurs Are you still free
